titles.title: Government Red-Tape Reduction Act
To require that in a notice of proposed rulemaking for a new rule, the notice shall identify three rules which the agency intends to repeal.
Government Red-Tape Reduction Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Antitrust, Commercial, and Administrative Law.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Administrative State, Regulatory Reform, and Antitrust

bill.summary:
Government Red-Tape Reduction Act
This bill requires federal agencies to identify three rules that the agency is repealing for any proposed new rule, unless the proposed rule is required by statute.
